name: Hectic DEDification
description:
This is a small game made in a week for the Brackey's Game Jam!

Left - Left Arrow / A  

Right - Right Arrow / D  

Attack - Alt / Z / J  

Jump - Ctrl / K / X

When you see a sword, that means you attack!

As a 13 year old, this is my first official game. A comment and feedback would be greatly appreciated! :]
